title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When a Tomcat 7 instance is started with no webapps deployed and a URL is accessed, it returns an HTTP code of 200 OK with no content, instead of an HTTP error 404.
OB: When a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed is accessed, it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed is accessed, it should return an HTTP error 404.
SR:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip.
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps.
3. Access a URL.
4. Observe that it returns HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
